title: 박진영
content:
박진영은 서울
자연과학대학
수학과
교수이다.
학력
B.S. Mathematics, Seoul National University, August 2010.
M.S. Mathematics, Seoul National University, August 2013.
Thesis Title: Asymptotic alignment of particle model with attractive-repulsive coupling.
Thesis Advisor : Prof. Seung-Yeal Ha.
Ph.D. Mathematics, Seoul National University, August 2016.
Thesis Title: On the asymptotic dynamics of particle and kinetic Kuramoto synchronization models
Thesis Advisor : Prof. Seung-Yeal Ha.
경력
Postdoctoral Researcher (Mentor: Prof. Juan Soler), Departamento de Matemática Aplicada, Facultad de Ciencias, Universidad de Granada, Spain, November 2016 – January 2018.
Assistant Professor, Department of Mathematics, Hanyang University, March 2018 – Present.
